commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'm going to work hard on our songs again!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I'm looking forward to seeing what you write.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: When you finish writing come have lunch with me and take a nap!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Oh. So this means we won't be eating lunch together for a while.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Guys, you just have to deal with it for a while. We have to provide an environment of focus for our song writer.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: We'll miss you while you're not around, but do your best!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, about that. What do you all think about eating here from now on?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: But won't we be interrupting?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Yeah, that's right. It's probably better for your focus to work alone.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Well, I did that before and it wasn't the best. After hearing what Î¼'s and Aqours said, I think it's better to write with everyone around.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: If I'm writing a song for all of you, I want to write it while we talk and share smiles.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: So we wouldn't be getting in the way?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Not at all! I would actually prefer you guys to be around to give me more ideas.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I guess that decides it!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I thought this might happen, so I actually brought my lunch with me.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I love how prepared you are, Kasumi.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: *Chuckle*

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Nice one, Kasukasu!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Don't call me that!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: If that's the case, let's all get lunch and meet back here!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: What's your happiest memory?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Where is that question coming from?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: You sound like you're interviewing us.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hahaha, it does, doesn't it? I want to get to know everyone better. Like what makes you happy and all that.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: My favorite food is my grandma's miso-pickled vegetables! Is that the kind of stuff you want to know?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Of course! What you're interested in, memories from your childhood, or times you were embarrassed or failed at something!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Oh, failures sound interesting.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: One time I thought I saw my friend and put my hands over her eyes and said guess who, but it was totally someone I didn't know at all.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Hahaha! That's so embarrassing!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: But because of that, we became friends!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: That doesn't sound like a failure to me.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: If you want to talk about failures...

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I just can't stop talking once I start about my favorite stuff. Just the other day I kept Karin on the phone for three hours.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Oh yeah, you did.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I thought I'd just let you talk while I did my nails, but I found myself listening and then promised to borrow that book from you.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: That's not a failure either. Well, I don't have any failures I guess.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I know one of your failures, Kasumi! Rina-chan Board says, "Stares."

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: What? When was that? I don't fail at anything.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I saw you practice doing your makeup.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Oh, I saw that too! I was surprised that Kasumi is interested in makeup.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: R-Rinako! Emma! What exactly did you see?!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: It made me think about how hard it is to put on fake eyelashes.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Wait. You saw me too, Ayumu?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: That bright red lipstick was very provocative.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Such dark eye shadow is good for on stage, but not anywhere else.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I felt like I saw something I wasn't supposed to.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Aggghhh! I can't believe all you guys saw me! That's so embarrassing!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Kasumi, I'll give you a makeup lesson sometime soon.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Ugh... *Sniff* Karin!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Kasumi, you don't need to wear makeup. You're plenty cute the way you are.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I'll do my best on this makeup lesson, but do you hear that? I'm perfectly cute without makeup!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: So Kasumi seems to be putting a lot of effort into makeup. How about the rest of you? What are you putting effort into?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Everyone's putting a lot of effort into our school idol practice! Other than that, I'm working on my cooking.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I can show you a thing or two about cooking.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I'm working hard on organizing my photos of Haruka. They've built up recently, so I'm working on making an album.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Do you take photos on your phone? There's an app that will make albums from the data for you.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Wait, something like that exists?! That will make making albums so easy!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I want to know about that app, too. I'd like to make an album of everyone.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: A picture album of all of us? That sounds great.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: This has turned into a normal conversation. Are you sure we're not keeping you from getting work done?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Not at all! I'm getting lots of ideas for my songs. I think I can write a terrific one.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Really? That's great!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I'm glad I could help. Rina-chan Board says, "Woo!"

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (There are sounds that come to mind as I look at everyone's smiling faces. I can even see all of them singing.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (I've been thinking about everyone in Nijigasaki while writing this song. I've been thinking about school idols, too.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (I've always thought school idols were something special to me.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (The impression I got from Aqours and Î¼'s live show was so great. It makes it even more special because it's a dream of mine.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (But this time, I think I realize something. School idols are special, but at the same time, they're not.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (I think what's actually important is our true thoughts, feelings, and troubles.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (That's why I'm putting all the smiles, love, and hardships we've experienced into this song!)
